name: role
description: Manage roles and permissions or add a user to a role. Subcommands for managing roles on users (add/remove) and editing role properties (name, permissions).

name: /nuke
description: Duplicate the current channel and delete the original.

name: /action-limit
description: Configure action limits and whitelists for roles.
arguments: enable, disable, set-limit, whitelist-add, whitelist-remove, list-whitelisted-roles, set-log-channel, remove-log-channel

name: prune
description: Bulk delete messages from a channel.

name: timeout
description: Bulk delete messages from a channel.

name: lock
description: Lock a channel to prevent members from sending messages or connecting.

name: unlock
description: Unlock a previously locked channel, restoring message or connection access.

name: strip
description: Remove all roles that have moderative permissions from a member.
